settings.guarantee: Jambys has a 77-day no-question-guarantee on your first product.
settings.start_text_mob: Build your Jambys outfit and get 22% off. Discount auto-applied & cannot be combined with other offers.
settings.top_text: The JamTee feels like nothing we've ever worn before. Crafted from the French Terry MicroModal, the JamTee feels super soft on the hand, but is still breathable, plush, and stretchy. Learn More
settings.top_text_long: The House Hoodie is stretchy, really soft, and lightweight. It's perfect for slightly cooler indoor temps, and breathable enough to wear for 93 hours in a row. (At hour 94, your body begins to fuse with the hoodie.) We know it sounds crazy, but just try wearing it shirtless at least once. Or don't. We're not your dad, and we never will be. Learn More
settings.bottom_text: Boxers with pockets. Sounds so crazy. Feels so good. Jambys are cozy and breathable like boxers, but designed to be worn on their own and around other people. They're unisex, stretchy, and softer than anything you've ever worn — guaranteed. (Seriously.) Learn More
settings.bottom_text_long: Sweatpants? There's no sweating here. Joggers? Jog in them and we'll sue. These are Long Jambys. Long Jambys are made out of the same super-soft Jambys material, creating a lightweight and breathable pant that's perfect for wearing inside during cooler weather. You can wear them with or without underwear. You could even wear them with Jambys underneath, you crazy son of a gun. Learn More
settings.review_title: Great Choices! Let’s review that outfit.
settings.review_subtitle: If you’ve changed your mind, you can reselect your top or bottom by clicking “reselect” button below.
settings.size_top_desktop: Fit is standard. Size up if you want a bigger, looser fit. If you’re in doubt, we always suggest sizing up, but with the way the material stretches, there’s plenty of forgiveness.
settings.size_top_mobile: Still not sure or gifting? Just email us some more info or DM us an Instagram screenshot. Whatever works. We don't rest until you have the perfect Jambys.
settings.size_bottom_desktop: If you're in doubt between sizes, size down for a feel closer to boxers, and size up for a feel closer to shorts. Don't worry: we make exchanges super easy.
settings.size_bottom_mobile: Still not sure or gifting? Just email us some more info or DM us an Instagram screenshot. Whatever works. We don't rest until you have the perfect Jambys.
